root.name: readBytes()
root.description: Reads data into an array of bytes. Returns the number of bytes read and stored in the array.

parameter.label: client
parameter.description: Client: any variable of type Client

parameter.label: buffer
parameter.description: byte[]: array of bytes to hold data

parameter.label: offset
parameter.description: int: index into buffer where to start storing data

parameter.label: length
parameter.description: int: maximum number of bytes to store
